nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
## STEP 1

Create a Google Sheet like this (Fill only the column "COUPON")

[![2mXGVwB.md.png]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}]

This is the basic Google Sheet used in [this Workflow]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
## STEP 2 - MAIN FLOW

This workflow is ideal for businesses looking to automate lead generation and management, especially when integrating with CRM systems like SuiteCRM and using Google Sheets for data tracking.

If you use an external form, hook the webbook trigger and the two webhooks "Respond KO" and "Respond OK" to the workflow.

It works with SuiteCRM 7.14.x and 8.x version. Remeber to create a Lead custom fields called 'coupon' on SuiteCRM.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Automate Drive-To-Store Lead Generation System (with coupon) on SuiteCRM

## Overview
Automated workflow: Automate Drive-To-Store Lead Generation System (with coupon) on SuiteCRM. This workflow integrates 9 different services: webhook, stickyNote, httpRequest, formTrigger, set. It contains 29 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 29
- **Node Types**: 9
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Token SuiteCRM**: httpRequest
- **Create Lead SuiteCRM**: httpRequest
- **Webhook**: webhook
- **On form submission**: formTrigger
- **Duplicate Lead?**: googleSheets
- **Form Fields**: set
- **Get Coupon**: googleSheets
- **Respond OK**: respondToWebhook
- **Respond KO**: respondToWebhook
- **Is Duplicate?**: if
- ... and 19 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
